articles.title: Pinocchio’s live-action trailer makes him look less like a real boy than ever - Polygon
articles.description: The live-action Disney Plus movie Pinocchio has a new trailer that includes Tom Hanks as Geppetto and Cynthia Erivo singing “When You Wish Upon a Star.” Pinocchio will be released on Sept. 8.
articles.content: The year of Pinocchio continues
